Definition at line 234 of file GPS.cs.

GpsPosition GPSMobile.Gps.GetPosition ( TimeSpan  maxAge  ) 

Get the position reported by the GPS receiver that is no older than the maxAge passed in.

Parameters:
maxAge Max age of the gps position data that you want back. If there is no data within the required age, null is returned. if maxAge == TimeSpan.Zero, then the age of the data is ignored
Returns:
GpsPosition class with all the position details
